description.en:
"Launched on 01/04/2019 by a team based in Nigeria, Gric Coin (GC) is an Agricultural Blockchain Project that is focused on improving agricultural practice and increase agricultural output globally with the major focus on Africa.

The Gric Coin Project is in 3 parts. 

1. The farm and Blockchain Project 

2. The Gric Coin Utility Project (Farm Partner)

3. The service adoption project. 

The Farm and Blockchain Project involve us purchasing and setting up a 1000 acres farm with processing and packaging industry to process and package items to the standard we need for our Blockchain website for product verification, authentication and reduction of food fraud. 

The Gric Coin Utility Project also known as farm partner Project is a platform where investors use Gric Coin and Farm Partner token to pay for investment in real live Agricultural Project and earn returns on their investment. www.farmpartner.ng 

The service adoption project is the last part of the project where we allow other Agricultural business to adopt the service and standard we have created as a benchmark for their own project. "
